Package ohos.media.camera.device

Class CameraStateCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.camera.device.CameraStateCallback

  • public abstract class CameraStateCallback
extends Object
    Provides callbacks for camera running states.

    A callback is an input parameter of CameraKit.createCamera(String, CameraStateCallback, EventHandler) and is used throughout the camera lifecycle from creation to release.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#CAMERA

    • Nested Class Summary

      • onPartialConfigured

        public void onPartialConfigured​(Camera camera)
        Called when the camera is successfully configured by Camera#configure after CameraConfig.Builder#addDeferredSurfaceSize was called to set the deferred surface size.

        After this callback is invoked, non-deferred surfaces that have been configured can be used for frame capture by calling Camera#triggerSingleCapture, Camera#triggerMultiCapture, or Camera#triggerLoopingCapture, whereas the deferred surface cannot be used for frame capture until it is added by CameraConfig.Builder#addDeferredSurface.

        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the camera.
        Since:
        3

      • onConfigureFailed

        public void onConfigureFailed​(Camera camera,
                              int errorCode)
        Called when camera configuration fails.

        Configure the camera again.

        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the camera.
        errorCode - Indicates the failure error code defined in CameraStateCallback.ErrorCode.
        Since:
        1

      • onReleased

        public void onReleased​(Camera camera)
        Called after the camera is released.
        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the camera.
        Since:
        1

      • onFatalError

        public void onFatalError​(Camera camera,
                         int errorCode)
        Called when an error occurs throughout the camera lifecycle.

        When a fatal error occurs, the camera will release itself, and CameraStateCallback#onReleased(Camera) is called.

        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the camera.
        errorCode - Indicates the failure error code defined in CameraStateCallback.ErrorCode.
        Since:
        1

      • onCaptureRun

        public void onCaptureRun​(Camera camera)
        Called when the capture starts.
        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the created Camera object.
        Since:
        4

      • onCaptureIdle

        public void onCaptureIdle​(Camera camera)
        Called after the camera is successfully configured, and did not start capturing or has stopped capturing.
        Parameters:
        camera - Indicates the created Camera object.
        Since:
        4
